casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Robert Teon INGRAM. No. 4P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2015. Jess D. Mekeel, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Bruce T. Cunningham, Jr., Southern Pines, for Ingram, Robert Teon. J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 2nd of January 2015 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of June 2015."
ERVIN, J. recused.
